data.message: My boss asked me to get rid of a fake facebook sight becauce one angry custormer made a fake profile for our store to give bad reviews. I want it deleted immediately.

replies.message: Hi Oliva. To learn how to report a Page to us, please visit our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2vSIEwC. You can report reviews that don't follow the Facebook Community Standards or don't focus on the product or service offered by the Page. We'll review your report and may remove reviews that don't follow our guidelines. To learn how to report reviews to us, visit: http://bit.ly/2vSwTWS. -Juliann
